[Home](../) &gt; [@lattice/view](./) &gt; Use

## Use type

Type of the use helper returned by createUse

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Use<TSvc> = <Args extends unknown[], Result>(behavior: (svc: TSvc) => (...args: Args) => Result) => (...args: Args) => Result;
```

## Example


```typescript
import type { Use } from '@lattice/view/helpers/use';
import type { DOMSvc } from '@lattice/view/presets/dom';

const useHelper: Use<DOMSvc> = createUse(svc);

// Define a reusable behavior
const clickHandler = (svc: DOMSvc) => (message: string) => {
  return svc.on('click', () => console.log(message));
};

// Bind it to the service
const onClick = useHelper(clickHandler);
el('button').ref(onClick('Button clicked!'))('Click me');
```
